channel.title: ATD Report: February 2020
channel.description:
The MESG Foundation’s commitment to transparency continues this month with the release of February 2020’s ATD and Financial Report. This report outlines the daily rates for March 2020, along with a financial report as a means of justification.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/p/0afed732-80b8-4b2a-aeef-3a84335a5e65/
